name: mdast
description: Speedy Markdown parser/stringifier for multipurpose analysis
author: Christopher Jeffrey

scripts.test-travis: npm run test-coveralls && npm run test-cli
scripts.test: npm run test-api && npm run test-cli
scripts.lint-api: eslint --env browser index.js lib/parse.js lib/stringify.js lib/utilities.js lib/expressions.js
scripts.lint-style: jscs --reporter inline index.js benchmark.js cli.js example.js script/build-options.js lib/parse.js lib/stringify.js lib/utilities.js test/index.js test/fixtures.js test/plugin.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-benchmark && npm run lint-cli && npm run lint-script && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage
scripts.build: npm run build-expressions && npm run build-usage && npm run build-options && npm run build-man && npm run build-bundle
